member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer
member.summary: Class that represents an adaptive Orchestrator recognizer.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.Kind
member.summary: The Kind name for this recognizer.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.ResultProperty
member.summary: Property key in RecognizerResult that holds the full recognition result from Orchestrator core.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.EntitiesProperty
member.summary: Property key used when storing extracted entities in a custom event within telemetry.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.BotFramework.Orchestrator.ILabelResolver)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Specifies full path to the snapshot file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.ModelFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the folder path to Orchestrator base model to use.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.SnapshotFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the full path to Orchestrator snapshot file to use.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.ExternalEntityRecognizer
member.summary: Gets or sets an external entity recognizer.
member.remarks: This recognizer is run before calling Orchestrator and the entities are merged with Orchestrator results.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.DisambiguationScoreThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the disambiguation score threshold.
member.value: Recognizer returns ChooseIntent (disambiguation) if other intents are classified within this threshold of the top scoring intent.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.DetectAmbiguousIntents
member.summary: Gets or sets detect ambiguous intents.
member.value: When true, recognizer will look for ambiguous intents - those within specified threshold to top scoring intent.

member.param: Context object containing information for a single turn of conversation with a user.
The incoming activity received from the user. The Text property value is used as the query text for QnA Maker.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Additional properties to be logged to telemetry with the LuisResult event.
Additional metrics to be logged to telemetry with the LuisResult event.
member.returns: A containing the QnA Maker result.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Orchestrator.OrchestratorRecognizer.FillRecognizerResultTelemetryProperties(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.RecognizerResult,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.DialogContext)
member.summary: Uses the RecognizerResult to create a list of properties to be included when tracking the result in telemetry.
member.param: A list of properties to append or override the properties created using the RecognizerResult.
member.returns: A dictionary that can be included when calling the TrackEvent method on the TelemetryClient.
